item.description:
The festival includes both live-action and animated films from across the globe, all of which tell a story in five minutes or less. Enjoy two distinct programs of films. Audience members vote for their three favorite films in each program. If you can't attend the whole event, hopefully you will be able to still meet us beforehand. PLEASE CHECK THE MEETUP WEBSITE BEFORE THE EVENT, TO SEE IF THERE ARE ANY EVENT UPDATES. For more information about the festival, visit www.mergingarts.org

Admission is just $8 total, whether you attend one or both programs.

5:30pm: Meet fellow members of the Western Mass Movie Meetup before the ticket counter. I haven't been to Flywheel before, so maybe this means right outside the venue.

6pm: The “Heartstrings" program presents warm, tender, and humorous films.

8pm: The “Headtrip" features darker, satirical, or puzzling films.

9:30pm: Reception, including DJ Madame B and special guests, along with hors d’oeuvres from East Village Café.
item.how_to_find_us: Look at pics of people who RSVP's on the Meetup website, so you'll have a better chance of recognizing them, as we find each other before the movie.
item.name: Short Short Story Film Festival
